description: A heavy mattress-like armor of cloth, leather and thick linings of Kevlar, originally used as protection in bullfighting.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A makeshift assembly of criniere, peytral and croupiere made from biosilicified chitin fitted to a thin mesh.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A makeshift assembly of criniere, peytral and croupiere made from chitin fitted to a thin mesh.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A heavy covering of chainmail, suitably made for elephants as protection.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

name.str: boiled leather elephant barding with caparison
name.str_pl: boiled leather elephant bardings with caparison

description: A full barding for elephants consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting a battle between a monstrous demon and a regal warrior astride an elephant and wielding an elaborate vajra.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

snippet_category.text: A full barding for elephants consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting a battle between a monstrous demon and a regal warrior astride an elephant and wielding an elaborate vajra.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

A full barding for elephants consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting a god with many arms bearing different items with one large uncovered breast on the left side.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

A full barding for elephants consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting several charging elephantry trampling enemy soldiers.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A full barding for elephants consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting an assortment of diamonds and gems.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

A full barding for elephants consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting a man in rich garments with a full uncovered belly on an elaborate chariot.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

A full barding for elephants consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting several identical smiling men in turbans of various bright colors performing a dance.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

A full barding for elephants consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting a fierce three horned dinosaur bursting out the side of a 1970s van.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

name.str: boiled leather elephant barding with bones
name.str_pl: boiled leather elephant bardings with bones

description: Decorative bones affixed to leather elephant barding to invoke fear in bandits and raiders and traders all!  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A thin plastic covering adapted for elephant to protect from acid rain and other caustic sources.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
